item.description:
Hi - I think it's about time for another dinner at Bullfinchs' in Sudbury MA as they have another great deal going on.


Bullfinchs Lobster Dinner $16 while supply lasts!!!!!!!!



  • 1 Â¼ pound lobster
  • corn on the cob
  • boiled potato
  • warm bread & butter


They will also have their regular menu available. Click Here to see more about this restaurant.

Please if you RSVP yes please show up so you are not taking up a spot that someone else may have wanted.

Thank you!

item.name: Lobster Dinner at Bullfinchs' in Sudbury
